text: Myroslav Skoryk (, 13 July 1938 – 1 June 2020) was a Ukrainian composer and teacher. His music is contemporary. He was born in Lwów, Ukraine. Skoryk was awarded the titles People's Artist of Ukraine and Hero of Ukraine. In April 2011 Skoryk was made artistic director of Kyiv Opera, a position he held until 2016. He also taught at the Lviv and Kyiv conservatory. Skoryk died on 1 June 2020 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 81.Ukrainian composer Myroslav Skoryk has died Помер український композитор Мирослав Скорик, Ukrayinska Pravda (1 June 2020) The famous composer Myroslav Skoryk died Помер відомий композитор Мирослав Скорик, Radio Svoboda (1 June 2020) ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ukrainian writers Category:Ukrainian composers Category:Ukrainian educators Category:Musicians from Lviv
title: Myroslav Skoryk
